name: Get Talk details from Title
info:
- Input: Talk Title in payload
 - Output: Talk Object

name: Get Extra Reading links
info:
- Input: Talk title as payload
 - Output: Array of DBWiki links and scores

info:
- Input: Talk title in payload

 - Output: New talk object in payload

info: Input: String Array. (Example: Java C and c++ Linux Unix)

msg.titlePayload is orignal input.

name: Prep abs for nlu
Outputs new talk object in payload
Get Doc
Get Abstract + description
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.abstract + msg.payload.description;

    return msg;

name: Get Doc
payload 2 categories
func:
msg.payload = msg.features.categories[0].label;
return msg;

name: Delay Complete
func:
msg.complete = true;
return msg;

msg.payload = "Delay Started!";
return msg;

msg.payload = "nlu prep done!";
return msg;

msg.payload = "NLU Done!";
return msg;

msg.payload = "Catergory join Done!";
return msg;

name: Join Complete
func:
msg.complete = false;
return msg;
